name: RetRo (Lour Studios)
description:
(This game is still under development.)

How Can I Install RetRo on My Computer?

First, extract the RetRo.zip file to the folder. Then enter the folder and navigate to the folder that shows the number of bits on your computer. Finally, run RetRo.exe and enjoy the game.
